execution_paths.title: Graph Mutation and Fail-Closed Edge Admission
execution_paths.objective: Mutate adjacency/edge state deterministically while enforcing strict fail-closed metadata policy.

primary_steps.description: Capture mutation intent and existing-node/attribute evidence.
Evaluate incompatibility probability and strict/hardened decision action.
Apply deterministic node/edge mutations and revision bump only on state change.

branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Also fail closed to preserve compatibility contract.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Emit evidence ledger record with reason `unknown_incompatible_feature`.

branch_paths.condition: Edge endpoint not present in node table.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Record left/right autocreate signals in evidence ledger.

recovery_actions: attach structured log forensics bundle ref

risk_notes: Fail-closed branch must not partially mutate adjacency maps.
Autocreate path must preserve deterministic insertion order.

execution_paths.title: Graph View Projection and Cached Snapshot Refresh
execution_paths.objective: Serve deterministic read views while refreshing stale cache snapshots on revision drift.

primary_steps.description: Resolve live graph projection for nodes/edges/neighbors.
Compare cached revision with graph revision.
Refresh snapshot only when revision drift is observed.

branch_paths.condition: Cached revision matches current graph revision.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: No-op branch with deterministic snapshot identity.

branch_paths.condition: Cached revision differs from graph revision.
branch_paths.strict_behavior: Rebuild snapshot and update cached revision.
branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Rebuild snapshot and update cached revision.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Force snapshot recomputation before returning reads.

risk_notes: Snapshot staleness branch must always refresh before read exposure.
View ordering must remain deterministic across refreshes.

execution_paths.title: Compatibility-Aware Dispatch Resolution
execution_paths.objective: Resolve backend deterministically with fail-closed handling for incompatible requests.

primary_steps.description: Compute decision action from mode, risk probability, and incompatibility feature flag.
Filter backend registry by mode permissions and required features.
Select backend by priority then lexical order and log decision evidence.

branch_paths.condition: No backend satisfies compatibility + feature constraints.

recovery_actions: capture requested backend and required feature evidence
link failure reason code in structured logs

risk_notes: Dispatch fail-closed branches must not silently degrade to alternate backends.

execution_paths.title: Conversion Ingest (Edge List + Adjacency)
execution_paths.objective: Convert external graph payloads into native graph state with strict/hardened parsing branches.

primary_steps.description: Resolve conversion backend compatibility contract.
Parse payload rows and classify malformed/empty identifiers.
Apply converted rows into graph mutation API with warning accumulation.

branch_paths.condition: Strict mode receives malformed node/edge payload.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Emit fail-closed ledger event with malformed payload context.

branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Record warning + FullValidate and skip malformed row.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Continue conversion with deterministic warning list.

risk_notes: Strict/hardened divergence must remain explicit and replay-verifiable.

execution_paths.title: Read/Write Serialization and Parse Recovery
execution_paths.objective: Enforce deterministic edge-list/json serialization with strict fail-closed parse branches and hardened bounded recovery.

primary_steps.description: Resolve read/write dispatch capability for selected format.
Parse incoming rows/json and classify malformed records.
Apply parsed content to graph state with deterministic warnings and ledger records.

branch_paths.condition: Strict parser encounters malformed edge-list line or invalid JSON.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Persist fail-closed reason in decision ledger.

branch_paths.condition: Hardened parser sees malformed row/json payload.
branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Emit warning and continue with valid rows.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Return report with warnings and deterministic graph snapshot.

recovery_actions: emit replay command for independent verification

risk_notes: Malformed-row recovery must never hide strict-mode failures.

execution_paths.title: Algorithm Execution (Shortest Path + Components + Centrality)
execution_paths.objective: Execute deterministic algorithm routines with complexity witness artifacts and edge-case branch handling.

primary_steps.description: Validate source/target and initialize queue/visited maps.
Traverse graph using ordered neighbor iteration.
Emit complexity witness with nodes_touched/edges_scanned/queue_peak.

branch_paths.condition: Source or target node absent for shortest-path query.
Singleton graph centrality denominator edge case.
branch_paths.strict_behavior: Return score=1.0 for singleton degree centrality.
branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Return score=1.0 for singleton degree centrality.

risk_notes: Algorithm edge-case branches must remain deterministic and witness-backed.

execution_paths.title: Conformance Harness Fixture Execution and Artifact Emission
execution_paths.objective: Run fixture pipelines, compare expected behavior, and emit structured logs + replay metadata.

primary_steps.description: Discover fixture paths and apply optional fixture filter.
Execute fixture operations through graph/dispatch/convert/readwrite/generator stack.
Emit smoke report, structured logs, normalization report, and dependent-unblock matrix.

branch_paths.condition: Fixture file unreadable or parse fails.
branch_paths.strict_behavior: Emit failed FixtureReport with reason_code read_error/parse_error.
branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Emit failed FixtureReport with reason_code read_error/parse_error.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Continue suite execution with remaining fixtures.

branch_paths.condition: Observed output diverges from expected fixture contract.
branch_paths.strict_behavior: Record mismatch and include failure repro payload.
branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Record mismatch and include failure repro payload.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Preserve structured logs and forensics bundle index for replay.

execution_paths.replay_command: rch exec -- cargo run -q -p fnx-conformance --bin run_smoke -- --mode strict
risk_notes: Mismatch branches must always preserve replay and forensics references.

execution_paths.title: Durability Sidecar Generation, Scrub Recovery, and Decode Drill
execution_paths.objective: Guarantee recoverable artifact durability with RaptorQ sidecars and decode-proof events.

primary_steps.description: Generate RaptorQ packets and write envelope with symbol hashes.
Compare source hash and trigger decode recovery when corrupted/missing.
Write decode proof entries for scrub recovery and decode drills.

branch_paths.condition: Artifact hash matches envelope source hash.
branch_paths.strict_behavior: Set scrub status to Ok and return.
branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Set scrub status to Ok and return.

branch_paths.condition: Artifact hash mismatch or artifact missing.
branch_paths.strict_behavior: Attempt decode and fail with HashMismatch on mismatch after decode.
branch_paths.hardened_behavior: Attempt decode and fail with HashMismatch on mismatch after decode.
branch_paths.fallback_behavior: Write recovered artifact and append decode proof when successful.

risk_notes: Recovery path must always emit decode-proof metadata for auditability.

branch_catalog.condition: Edge endpoint not present in node table.
Cached revision matches current graph revision.
Cached revision differs from graph revision.
No backend satisfies compatibility + feature constraints.
Strict mode receives malformed node/edge payload.
Strict parser encounters malformed edge-list line or invalid JSON.
Hardened parser sees malformed row/json payload.
Source or target node absent for shortest-path query.
Singleton graph centrality denominator edge case.
Fixture file unreadable or parse fails.
Observed output diverges from expected fixture contract.
Artifact hash matches envelope source hash.
Artifact hash mismatch or artifact missing.

verification_bead_crosswalk.title: [DOC-PASS-09] Unit/E2E Test Corpus and Logging Evidence Crosswalk
[FOUNDATION] Unit/Property Test Conventions + Structured Log Contract

alien_uplift_contract_card.expected_value_statement: Explicit execution-path tracing reduces behavioral ambiguity and tightens replayable parity guarantees under strict/hardened branching.

decision_theoretic_runtime_contract.loss_model: Minimize expected compatibility loss by ensuring every control-flow branch and fallback is explicitly documented and replay-linked.

safe_mode_fallback.fallback_action: halt publication and emit fail-closed diagnostics
